metadata.title: CVE-2021-45868 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel before 5.15.3, fs/quota/quota_tree.c does not validate the block number in the quota tree (on disk). This can, for example, lead to a kernel/locking/rwsem.c use-after-free if there is a corrupted quota file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-45868` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.13.0-37-generic - 5.13.0-28.31
linux-image-5.13.0-37-generic-lpae - 5.13.0-28.31
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-generic - 5.13.0-28.31
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-generic-64k - 5.13.0-28.31
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-lowlatency - 5.13.0-28.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-1019-aws - 5.13.0-1012.13
No subscription required
